data.description: Integrated treatment of macroeconomics and microeconomics (seeECON 101andECON 102). Accelerated approach to economics training, especially for Economics: Math Emphasis majors.
data.title: PRINCIPLES OF ECONOMICS-ACCELERATED TREATMENT

data.description: The history of China's economic reforms and development, the nature of its growth, and the fundamental institutions that underlie its transformation into an economic powerhouse.  China's integration into and impact on the world economy through trade and financial flows. Major challenges modern China faces, such as regional inequalities, environmental concerns, and the prospects for sustainable growth in the future.
data.title: THE CHINESE ECONOMY

data.description: Economic problems of individuals, firms and industries with emphasis on value, price, and distribution of income.
data.title: PRINCIPLES OF MICROECONOMICS
